messages.subject: I feel like I've finally found people like me!
messages.msgSnippet: This is so cool! My basic philosophy on life is exactly what homeschooling professes.  Obviously, I have always been *different* and *wrong*.  Thank goodness
messages.messageBody:
This is so cool! My basic philosophy on life is exactly what homeschooling
professes. Obviously, I have always been *different* and *wrong*. Thank
goodness I'm too stubborn to give in. I started homeschooling/unschooling my
13 year old son in January. Public school sucks. I'm a home instructor for
various school districts, and they're all alike: horrible. I'm so glad I
wandered onto this list. It sometimes gets lonely being the only right
person. : )

Sue


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
